results.name: a(n) = (1/1 - 1/2 + ... + (-1)^(n-1)/n)*lcm{1..n}.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to lcm's
mathematica: nn=30;With[{fr=Accumulate[Table[1/(n (-1)^(n-1)),{n,nn}]]}, Table[fr[[n]] LCM@@ Range[n],{n,nn}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 27 2012 *)
program: a025530 n = sum $ map (div (a003418 $ fromInteger n))
